SubmitOrderPromptDescription: Cart will be locked until payment is completed
AlipayMiniProgramAndPayByCashOnly: Proceed to the counter to pay
UnableBackMenuDescription: You may only return to the menu once you <bold>completed your payment</bold>. Select ‘Pay Now’ to proceed.
UnableBackMenuAndPendingPaymentDescripti: You may only return to the menu once you <bold>completed your payment</bold>. Select payment method to proceed
UnableBackMenuDynamicUrlExpiredDescripti: QR has expired, please ask the cashier for a new QR code and scan again to Add items
ReceiptNumberInValidDescription: Please return to the cart and try again. You may also reach out to the staff for assistance
